mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, D.* FROM( SELECT A.CODEWALL_ID , A.CODE_EDITOR_ID , A.MEMBER_ID , A.PROJECT_ID , A.COMPANY_ID , TO_CHAR(A.CODEWALL_WRITE_DATE , 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS CODEWALL_WRITE_DATE , A.CODE_CONTENT , A.CODE_TITLE , B.MEMBER_NAME as CODE_WALL_WRITER , C.CODE_LANGUAGE FROM CODEWALL A LEFT JOIN MEMBER B on A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN CODE_EDITOR C ON A.CODE_EDITOR_ID = C.CODE_EDITOR_ID WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} ) D ORDER BY RNUM DESC

SELECT A.CODEWALL_ID , A.CODE_EDITOR_ID , A.MEMBER_ID , A.PROJECT_ID , A.COMPANY_ID , A.CODEWALL_WRITE_DATE , A.CODE_CONTENT , A.CODE_TITLE , B.MEMBER_NAME as CODE_WALL_WRITER , C.CODE_LANGUAGE FROM CODEWALL A LEFT JOIN MEMBER B on A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN CODE_EDITOR C ON A.CODE_EDITOR_ID = C.CODE_EDITOR_ID WHERE CODEWALL_ID = #{codewallId}
